definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: However the market economy system has brought about a strong dash to the heating supply of the cogeneration.
sentences.chinese: 市场经济体制带给热电联产向采暖供热以猛烈冲击。

sentences.english: I hope to solarize my house within 5 years.
sentences.chinese: 我希望能用太阳能给我的房间供热五年。

sentences.english: This paper elaborates the control principle of the vacuum heater and the achieving method.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了真空供热机组的控制原理及其实现方法。

sentences.english: In Iceland, many of the buildings and even swimming pools are heated with geothermal hot water.
sentences.chinese: 在冰岛，许多大楼甚至游泳池都是由地热水供热。

sentences.english: If the temperature falls , turn up the heating .
sentences.chinese: 如果温度下降，就增加供热量。

sentences.english: Central heating pipe network hydraulic balance debugging techniques are explored in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 对米东区集中供热管网水力平衡调试技术的几点探索。

sentences.english: The apartment was centrally heated,and we had bottled gas to cook with.
sentences.chinese: 公寓套间集中供热，我们有瓶装煤气做饭。

sentences.english: Keep good relationship with district heating companies , heating power plants and design institutes.
sentences.chinese: 与区域供热公司，热力厂以及设计院保持良好的关系。

sentences.english: If the temperature reading is below the set point, turn on heating.
sentences.chinese: 如果温度读数低于设置点，那么打开供热。

sentences.english: Thesource of heat in this old house was an archaic coal stove.
sentences.chinese: 这栋旧房子内惟一的供热来源是个古老的煤炉。

sentences.english: It is needed to install a compensator every other distance in the heating pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 在供热管道敷设中，需每隔一段距离安装一个补偿器。

sentences.english: Heating bill, so the company is helpless now .
sentences.chinese: 供热公司如此下血本，实在是无奈啊。

sentences.english: The objective function of the optimization is the saving present value per unit heat consumption during the calculation period.
sentences.chinese: 目标函数为计算期内单位供热量的节约额现值。

sentences.english: There is a new central-heating system in this building.
sentences.chinese: 这座大楼里有一套新的中央供热系统。

sentences.english: The cheap electricity at night can be used for space heating by a thermal storage system.
sentences.chinese: 蓄热式电采暖系统可以利用夜间廉价电供热。

sentences.english: Several crematoria now export energy to local companies.
sentences.chinese: 现在，有几个火葬厂已经在给当地公司供热。

definition: fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
